body.name: KToyoung Handheld Game Console, Built-in 1200 Games 4.3’’ HD Screen Retro Gaming System, Support TV Output, Portable Rechargeable Game Console with Dual Joystick, Best Gift for Kids and Adult (Blue)
body.stockDetail: Only 16 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Free 1200+ Classic Games】 Built-in 1200+ real no-repeat old school classic games, Support ARCADE/NEOGEO/CPS/FC/NES/SFC/SNES/GBA/GBC/GB/SMC/SMD/SEGA Games, It’s suitable for adults and kids. This is a game console full of retro memories, perfect for playing with your partner and children.

【Multi-functional game console】 Support AVI, WM FLV, RM, RMVE, MP4 , 3GP, MPEG , VOB , DAT and SWF video format, output AV TV, music/picture/e-book/calculator/clock function/calendar/recorder. Support DTS 5.1 stereo surround sound.

【Portable & Long use time】 Built-in 1500mAh polymer lithium rechargeable battery, lasting 30 hours of battery life! Continuous playback for 8 hours. Configure the USB cable. It’s compact and lightweight and very convenient to bring outside to play with your friends.

【Intelligent Operating】You can save the game progress and play again with last game progress by pressing "SELECT" button, then selecting "Save Game". Games can be deleted directly or downloaded from the computer.

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】 Ideal gift for kids and adults on birthday or any occasion. The retro handheld game console not only bringing the funny game time to children but also waking up the wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults.
body.description: Built-in 1200+ real no-repeat old school classic games, super classic games covering a variety of types of games, such as adventure, shooting, action, racing and so on. and other classic FC games. You can play more than 1200 built-in games anytime and anywhere. Note: After turning on the ON/OFF button, please press start button to start the console. Since we have many games built into the console, only some of them are shown on the desktop, for more games, please select the "game" icon in the lower left corner to view them. Specifications: Screen: 4.3 inches, 260,000 full-color TFT screen Battery: Built-in 1500 mAh battery, the movie about four hours, MP3 music 8 hours. Multi Language: English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Italian French, German. Game features: support 8 emulators, 8-128 the following games, online games Video: supporting format of AVI, WM FLV,RM, RMVE, MP4, 3GP, MPEG, VOB, DAT and SWF. Music: supporting format of WMA, OGG, MP3, APE, FLAC, WAV, ACC play in format. Audio recording built-in microphone, stopwatch\calculator\calendar function, Learning features support eBook, Lyrics synchronization support two-line display lyrics ,File storage any storage file browser, delete, copy and other operations, data manager Point Play. Control and regulation: does not support multi-tasking operations. External expansion card: maximum support 32GB TF Card. AV cable not include. How to find more games? Find the "Games" icon in the lower left corner of the screen, press the "A" key to enter, select "built-in game"or"Optional Game"---"Dir List", press the "A" key to enter, you will see more games. How to archive game？ When playing the game, press "SELECT" to exit the game then select "save game" in the menu, press A to determine, a game saves up to six game progress. If you want to follow the previous game schedule, after entering the game, press "SELECT"-"load schedule" to do so. How to add games\game delete? Contact us to get more game download URL. 1.When connected to the computer, you can see the tour in the "GMAE" file.The game can be deleted, but the game fixed in the machine can not be seen on the computer, it can not be deleted. 2.How to download the game? Users can search for games online, download the games to the computer first, and then use USB.Connect the game console to the computer and copy the downloaded game from the computer to GAME in the game console.Folder (Game File Suffix Name： gba/gbc/gb/sfc/nes, due to downloaded games from various websitesFiles may be different. Sometimes there will be situations that do not support them. Please delete them and download them on other websites. Troubleshooting 1.Game consoles can't boot Check if the battery is running out. Connect to USB or charger and try to restart it after charging. 2.No sound can be heard in headphones Please check if the volume is set to 0. Please check if the headphone is inserted into the jack correctly. 3.Serious noise Please check that the plug of the headphone is clean. Dirt can cause noise.Please check if the music file is damaged and try playing other music to make sure. If the file has been damaged, it may cause damage.To produce a very serious noise or jump. 4.Screen display scrambling Check that the correct language options have been set 5.Unable to dowrtoad files Make sire that the computer is properly connected to the game console Make sure that the storage space of the internal memory is full Make sire the USB connection is damaged. Package Included: 1x Handheld Game Console 1x Earphone 1x USB Cable 1x User Instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun game my husband loved it for Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Gave this 2 changes and both consoles didn't work
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 6 year old son for Christmas - initially - he loved it! But I had to trouble shoot and find the games for him - even start each new game for him because there's no obvious button to navigate the device. That got old really fast... but on day 2 when the audio stopped working entirely - I decided to return it and buy the same thing again to see if it would be better. The new game arrived and had totally different games on it - (after a long time of searching and pressing a billion buttons randomly). After 1 day, the up and down buttons stopped working - making it impossible to actually play a game. Another return. Super disappointing because this would have been perfect for travel. But it just doesn't work and even the instructions basically say you just have to mess around with it to find games and get them to work. Very strange. Don't waste your time and money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars bad games and controls and not all features work
reviews.reviewText: The one I got had 10,000 built in titles with no ability to search them and most of them were duplicate. Other than the titles on the home screen the built in games are worthless. I have a big ROM library but they only really work for GB/GBC/GBA/NES/SNES. The Genesis games work but I could not all the buttons work so only Sonic is worth downloading. There is a settings field to adjust the controls but it would not let me set up certain buttons and is worthless. I also purchased a 32GB memory card but when it was installed the system would not start or crash if it was on. Music also works but you have to use folders and again, no search function. Good for small(test 4GB micro SD card) external games(you load ROMS) but only for GB/GBC/GBA/NES/SNES.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome handheld with no battery life.
reviews.reviewText: This thing has tons of games including lots of rare and hacked games. It feels nice in hand. Like a psp. Many of the games are duplicates or different versions of the same game so I’d say the real number of games is closer to 500 with half of these being Japanese only. But that doesn’t matter since you will probably just download the games you actually want to play which is really easy.The main problem I’ve had with this handheld is that after charging for the recommended 4 hours I get less than 45 minutes of play of time before needing to charge again. I made sure I’m using a 3.5 v plug. So I’m guessing these thing have a terrible battery or I just got a bad batch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a really good game
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had doubts when I was buying this game so I was hoping it works. It arrived early and the description was correct.This game brings back memory for me. I bought this game for my 7 years son. He loves it with over a thousand games to choose from. The screen light is not too bright which I like. The game works perfectly fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It is a good system and plays well with lots of games!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Janky handheld emulator
reviews.reviewText: The software and command controls for this unit are very hard to work through. Games have completely weird running speeds with no control over slowing or speeding up. Going to try some other ROMs to set if that solves the game issue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The select button doesn’t work. So therefore you can’t move on and can’t start to play a game bec the select button doesn’t work at all. For a 4-9 years old, it would be hard for them to figure the controls as they are not user friendly.
